fullplot: Dheerendra Singh is a kick-boxer, who after beating Gajanan Dinan, has been selected to represent India in the 14th Annual Kick-boxing tournament in Kuala Lumpur where he will be pitted against Pakistan's Noor Mohammad. He is engaged to Neela Chaudhary, and lives with his widowed mother, and a cricketer brother, Veerender. The family witness Dheerendra excel himself during his bout against Noor but ends up gravely injured, and subsequently passes away after a kick in the neck area. When the Malaysian Government rules it as an accident, an enraged Dheerendra opts out of cricket, joins the kick-boxing team, and travels to Lahore (a city that was founded by Vishnu Avatar Ramji's son, Lav) to participate in the Quid-E-Azam Tournament where he hopes to avenge his brother's untimely death but is not aware of the outcome of his quest as well as the surprises that await him there.
plot: A cricketer turns kick-boxer in order to avenge the death of his brother.
title: Lahore
